comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Looks like three girls and the rest are boys.   Seems they were acting out a circus--the boy second from the left has an elephant's trunk and ears; many of the children have clown hats; the girl in the farright may be dressed as a monkey?  The girl four from the left has a box labeled "hand organ," and there's a paper chain around some of the children's shoulders.
